solution_line_template: The cost of the movie online was twice what Mike paid, so {twice_multiplier} * {mike_paid} = ${<<{twice_multiplier}*{mike_paid}={online_movie_cost}>>{online_movie_cost}}.
The shopping costs were standing at {shipping_percentage} * {online_movie_cost} = ${<<{shipping_percentage}*{online_movie_cost}={shipping_costs}>>{shipping_costs}}.
